titles.title: Bank Service Company Examination Coordination Act of 2021
A bill to amend the Bank Service Company Act to provide improvements with respect to State banking agencies, and for other purposes.
Bank Service Company Examination Coordination Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Bank Service Company Examination Coordination Act of 2021
This bill requires the coordination of state banking agencies with federal banking agencies in regulating and examining the activities of bank service companies. It also allows for the sharing of information related to examinations and regulations between federal and state agencies.
